attributes.action: Name Shoreham Footbridge after Harry Elmer
attributes.additional_details:
The people of Shoreham by Sea would like our
new footbridge to be named after Harry Elmer.
Harry was a local man from Shoreham by Sea and died in 1940 while operating the original footbridge. He was a ferryman before the original footbridge was built.  His family still reside in Shoreham.

We want  the name of the new footbridge to reflect the history and people of Shoreham and it should be named after Harry Elmer. We want West Sussex District Council to add Harry Elmer to the shortlist of names so that the local people of Shoreham can vote on it.

rejection.details: Because this is a local decision any petition would need to be addressed to the local council.
